name: Hellenic Anti-Corruption Organization
legal: Private Company - Civil Society Non for Profit (Αστική Μη Κερδοσκοπική Εταιρεία)
goal:
Hellenic Anti-Corruption Organization as member of the UN Global Compact is determined to promote its 10 principles in order to assist Greece to implement anti corruption policies in govermental - regional and local level by promoting transparency and accountability in the public and private sector.
H.AC.O promotes a very innovative legisltative framework for the protection of Whistleblowers.
Finaly the Organization is planning the creation of a Special Reprisal Victim Unit in order to protect employees from any form of descrimination and reprisals at work.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Sport
euInitiatives:
H.AC.O is currently following the SRSS activities on Greece's technical reform support project, in the following policy areas:
Governance and public administration
Revenue administration and public financial management
rule of law, anti-corruption, anti-money-laundering and anti-fraud activities
Investment climate
Public assets
